name: The Mystical Treasure Chest
description:
How to play:

Move around the environment and pick up items and drop them in the mystical chest and wait for it to turn them into something new! The chest will only doing something if you have a correct combination (just wait a couple seconds)

(Note: only two items can be combined together) It is up to you to find out which two create new things! 

Controls:

Menu Button (Left controller) to bring up menu

A Button to select menu options

Left analogue stick to move forward/back and left/right

Right analogue stick to snap turn (or you can turn in the real world)

Both the left and right grip buttons allow for you to pick up items in the environment

Both the left and right triggers will allow you to fire the gun (if you have the right gun....no spoilers)
